post.body: That's good news! Can you be a little specific about what elements make this a RPG mod? From the screens it looked just like a FPS shooter. Does the character have some stats that can be raised or manipulated, or are items and an inventory involved?

post.author: jizaboz
post.body:
der_ton wrote:
That's good news! Can you be a little specific about what elements make this a RPG mod? From the screens it looked just like a FPS shooter. Does the character have some stats that can be raised or manipulated, or are items and an inventory involved?


Yeah, it looks like most basic shooters because all the pics are in 1st person mode, but 3rd person mode will work too. There are stats (Level, Experience, Gold) and a shop system. No special inventory system yet though. But it's more like say... Quake 2's "King of the Server" mod than other more story-based single-player RPG mods. The first version will be a bit bare-bones but playable and should be stable over network games... if there's some interest and as time goes on I hope to make additional versions with more content.
